attributes.title: Miscarriage
attributes.review: This app sucker punched me in the uterus (I was pregnant )and pull out my child say ‘all lives matter’. -10/10 wouldn’t recommend.

attributes.title: Read this
attributes.review: I believe that all of these people who think that trump is a good person is a Karen. And they don’t even know how to spell TikTok. So anyway, gen z will rise and TikTok will survive.

attributes.title: BEWARE!
attributes.review: Honestly, this is the worst app ever. Almost immediately after downloading my phone started glitching and playing the national anthem. Beware!

attributes.title: NOT GOODDD
attributes.review: If I could give this 0 stars I would , it glitches , and makes my phone turn off .
Wouldn’t recommend gives me bad service every time I open it won’t get that 5G anytime soon...

attributes.title: terrible. absolutely horrifying.
attributes.review: i signed up for the app and all i see is a orange person selling racist slurs and saying very derogatory comments. i expected a president i can look up to but why am i seeing a cheeto call me the n word? crazy how this is still going on. please take this off the app store.

attributes.title: Worst app and made me vomit
attributes.review: Not too fond of racist pedophiles that hate woman and want to sleep with their daughter. Also, why so orange???? Worst app. Don’t download or you’ll LOSE your morality 🤢🤢🤢 also he HAS NO LIPS NO KISS FOR HIM, VERY UGLY

attributes.title: MOST TREMENDOUSLY HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: I have never seen an app as disgusting and offensive as this one. I cannot believe Apple would let this still be on the App Store! Wow! Supporting a fascist is NOT the move. DELETE!!!!!!!!!
